name: JoBiz
desc: Cross-platform job portal for jobs, internships, startups, and career growth (Android, iOS, Web).

name: SwapSkill
desc: A Peer-to-Peer Skill Exchange Platform built with Flask, Firebase Auth, Firestore, and Firebase Storage. Features include profile creation, skill posting, swap requests, and live filtering.

name: QuickCourt
desc: An AI-powered legal case search and quick judgment suggestion platform. Built with NLP, Flask, and SQLite.

name: StreetConnect
desc: A hyperlocal vendor-supplier connection platform that bridges small street vendors with reliable suppliers. It enables easy ordering, trust-based matching, and affordable micro-supply chains.
features: Smart Matching based on Location & Needs

name: Medipulse
desc: A healthcare chatbot web app that answers medical queries and provides personalized responses based on past conversations.

name: Trend Analyzer
desc: A web app that fetches the latest news, organizes them by date, and displays a curated list to the user. Integrates APIs like NewsAPI and other sources to collect and display trending news.
features: Display list of news articles with links
